sources.title: Moscow Heat | Full Action Drama Movie | Michael York | Alexander Nevsky
sources.description:
Moscow Heat - A retired diplomat and an LAPD detective seek justice, by pursuing a psychotic killer to Moscow. With the help of a Moscow police, they weave their way through labyrinth of the Russian underworld as time is running out.
2004.  Stars: Michael York, Alexander Nevsky, Richard Tyson

metadata.Plot: A retired Diplomat and an NYPD Detective seeking justice, pursue a psychotic murderer to Moscow. When the Detective is wounded and the Diplomat is arrested, they are assigned to be deported by a Russian Police Captain, who becomes an unlikely accomplice in exacting their revenge on an international black market nuclear arms dealer.
metadata.Actors: Michael York, Alexander Nevsky, Richard Tyson
